contentencoded: This week: Bob Odenkirk, comedy polymath & “Breaking Bad” breakout star, talks sketch and Saul… … Pop provacateur Peaches strips down etiquette… Folk-rock icon Linda thompson plays party DJ … Small island, big library … Food writer Nigel slater recalls pre-parm Britain … Behind the scenes with Johnny Carson …  Leafy green humor … And a flood of beer was not as fun as it sounds.

title: Episode 223: Bob Odenkirk, Linda Thompson, and Peaches Teaches
